title: Rebekah Vardy thanks husband Jamie for 'faith, trust and loyalty'
text:
Rebekah Vardy paid tribute to her husband Jamie for his continued support during her WAG war against Coleen Rooney.

The TV personality, 37, gushed about her 'true love' as she thanked him for his 'faith, trust and loyalty' in an inspirational snap shared to her Instagram on Thursday.

She also posted a sweet snap alongside her children Finley, nine, Sophia, five, and Taylor, two, as they enjoyed a marshmallow bonfire.

Rebekah Vardy paid tribute to 'true love' Jamie as she thanked him for his 'faith, trust and loyalty' during her WAG war against Coleen Rooney, in an Instagram story shared on Thursday

Alongside the snap of two lovers hugging, the inspirational quote said: 'True love requires faith, trust and loyalty. Not chocolate, flowers and expensive gifts.'

In response, Rebekah claimed she 'loved this', and tagged her husband as she wrote: 'I love you xxx'

Meanwhile, with her family snap the expectant mother wrote: 'Hot Chocolate & Toasted Marshmallow kind of day.'

Gushing: Alongside the snap of two lovers hugging, she said she 'loved' the inspirational quote as she tagged her husband and wrote: 'I love you xxx'

Family time: Rebekah also posted a sweet snap alongside her children Finley, nine, Sophia, five, and Taylor, two, as they enjoyed a marshmallow bonfire

Rebekah was accused by Coleen of leaking stories about her to The Sun newspaper, which the expectant I'm A Celebrity star has fiercely denied.

Sources close to Becky say leading law firm Kingsley Napley has sent Coleen a letter on her behalf demanding she provides them with the evidence she has against Becky so that she can complete her investigation.

Becky has called in a forensic team to analyse her Instagram account and identify the mole who sold fake stories to The Sun from Coleen’s Instagram account.

As part of that probe, they say, they have asked Wayne’s wife to give them the proof they have that the source must have been Becky’s Instagram account.

Shock: Rebekah was accused by Coleen of leaking stories about her to The Sun newspaper, which the expectant I'm A Celebrity star has fiercely denied (pictured in June 2016)

Tackling things: Coleen, 33, claimed the pregnant star had been leaking stories from her private Instagram to The Sun newspaper

The feuding pair are said to be communicating through their lawyers in the wake of the bitter row which has dominated social media and newspapers this week.

A source close to heavily pregnant Vardy now claims she is fully prepared to face her fellow WAG in court if she refuses to believe her innocence.

An insider exclusively told MailOnline on Wednesday night that 'Rebekah wants to prove she had nothing to do with the leaked stories and is working with a lawyer and IT experts who can look at the forensics of her Instagram, which several people have access to.'

Serious: The feuding pair are said to be communicating through their lawyers in the wake of the bitter row which has dominated social media and newspapers this week

Meanwhile, friends of Coleen say she will not be goaded into coming forward with any further evidence as she is happy with her own investigations.

A spokesman for Coleen said: 'It is irrefutable that the leaks came from one account, and one account only.'

The scandal has gripped the nation to such an extent that police officers went to the Vardys' home because of the horrific trolling they faced.
description: The TV personality, 37, gushed about her 'true love' as she thanked him for his 'faith, trust and loyalty' in an inspirational snap shared to her Instagram on Thursday.
